Class MusicHubServer

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
musichub.server.MusicHubServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class MusicHubServer
extends java.lang.Thread
MusicHubServer Class Handle the MusicHub on the server.
Author:
Elouan Toy

  • Method Details

    • launch

      public void launch​(int port)
      Start the server and wait for a connection. Launch the ServerInstance in a new thread if a new client is connected.
      Parameters:
      int - port the port where the server should listen

      Parameters:
      String - elementTitle title of the audio element to add
